formal_name:
Mario vs. Donkey Kong™
Tipping Stars: Update
description:
An update for "Mario vs. Donkey Kong™ Tipping Stars" is now available from Nintendo eShop. All customers who own a copy of “Mario vs. Donkey Kong™ Tipping Stars” should download the update. This will update the software to Version 1.0.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
name:
Mario vs. Donkey Kong™
Tipping Stars: Update
